# Common components and utilities for React.js

Uses ES6/7 syntax.

## Components

### ValueValidationComponent

Abstract component for form fields that shall be validated. This should really be a Mixin, but [Mixins donâ€™t work with ES6/React.js][es6-mixins] yet.


[es6-mixins]: https://facebook.github.io/react/docs/reusable-components.html#no-mixins
